original_text: Formerly, when you did not know God, you were slaves to those who by nature are not gods.
korean_text: 그러나 너희가 그 때에는 하나님을 알지 못하여 본질상 하나님이 아닌 자들에게 종 노릇 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Formerly, when you did not know God
sentences.korean_translation: 전에 너희가 하나님을 알지 못할 때에

sentences.original_text: you were slaves to those who
